DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS SexFS v2.0 Brief Profile (Female) SFOGP203 Past 30 Days How Satisfying Are Orgasms or Climaxes Score 6 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response, in the past 30 days, of how satisfying their orgasms or climaxes have been, using a 6-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female) Past 30 Days How Satisfying Are Orgasms or Climaxes Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health._A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._A question about how satisfying an individual's orgasms or climaxes have been._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.

Concepts.longName: PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female)

A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance per K. Laumann

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes ranging from 0 (Have Not had) to 5 (Very).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has not had an orgasm or climax.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has not had an orgasm or climax.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual is not at all satisfied.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual is not at all satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual is a little satisfied.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual is a little satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual is somewhat satisfied.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual is somewhat satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual is quite satisfied.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual is quite satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating a high level of satisfaction.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating a high level of satisfaction.

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
